subtitles.xx: //[DIANA]\\//(0,7)\\Welcome to Austria, Agent 47. Your targets are DORIAN LANG, GUILLAUME MAISON and DORIS LEE, three remaining members of the international gang of thieves known as THE YARDBIRDS; The Yardbirds were famous for their daring heists, in particular one that took place against Shamal Casino in Las Vegas. However, the money proved to be the property of organized criminals who in turn launched a campaign of violence and retaliation in an effort to identify the thieves and find the money. Feeling the earth burn beneath them, the Yardbirds entered into a secret agreement – the treasure would remain hidden and once the dust settled, the last remaining member were to inherit everything. The group retired and all members vanished from sight until Kalvin Ritter, THE SPARROW, was found dead on his yacht but the remaining members remained elusive. The group never gathers in one place but today is a special occasion – the wedding of ELIZABETH LANG is taking place at the palatial home of GUILLAUME MAISON with DORIS LEE as a special guest. Our client is Aleksander Kovak, the founder and fourth surviving member of the Yardbirds. He has stipulated that all three targets and their bodyguards must be eliminated at this event. Should any of the Yardbirds escape, the contract is invalidated. Looks like Kovak is making his final bid for the lost millions. Good luck.
subtitles.en: //[DIANA]\\//(4.1,6.82)\\Welcome to Austria, Agent 47.//(6.82,11.15)\\Your targets are Dorian Lang, Guillaume Maison and Doris Lee,//(11.15,15.98)\\three remaining members of the international gang of thieves known as The Yardbirds;//(15.98,22.83)\\The Yardbirds were famous for their daring heists, in particular, one that took place against Shamal Casino in Las Vegas.//(22.83,26.23)\\However, the money proved to be the property of organized criminals//(26.23,29.41)\\who in turn launched a campaign of violence and retaliation//(29.41,32.61)\\in an effort to identify the thieves and find the money.//(32.61,34.41)\\Feeling the earth burn beneath them,//(34.41,37.03)\\the Yardbirds entered into a secret agreement//(37.03,39.95)\\– the treasure would remain hidden and once the dust settled,//(39.95,43.87)\\the last remaining member was to inherit everything.//(43.87,46.61)\\The group retired and all members vanished from sight until//(46.61,51.1)\\Kalvin Ritter, The Sparrow, was found dead on his yacht,//(51.1,53.95)\\but the remaining members remained elusive.//(55.25,60.03527)\\The group never gathers in one place, but today is a special occasion//(60.03527,61.55)\\– the wedding of Elizabeth Lang//(61.55,64.31)\\is taking place at the palatial home of Guillaume Maison//(64.31,67.2)\\with Doris Lee as a special guest.//(67.2,71.47)\\Our client is Aleksander Kovak, the founder of the Yardbirds.//(71.47,74.51)\\He has stipulated that all three targets and their bodyguards//(74.51,76.63)\\must be eliminated at this event.//(76.63,80.9)\\Should any of the Yardbirds escape, the contract is invalidated.//(80.9,84.9)\\Looks like Kovak is making his final bid for the lost millions.//(86.3,93.3)\\Good luck!
subtitles.fr: //[DIANA]\\//(4.1,6.82)\\Bienvenue en Autriche, 47.//(6.82,11.15)\\Vos cibles sont Dorian Lang, Guillaume Maison et Doris Lee,//(11.15,15.98)\\trois membres encore vivants d'un réseau international de voleurs connu sous le nom des Yardbirds;//(15.98,18.78)\\Les Yardbirds étaient célèbres pour leurs casses spectaculaires,//(18.78,22.83)\\notamment celui du Shamal Casino, à Las Vegas.//(22.83,26.23)\\Cependant, il est apparu que l'argent appartenait déjà à un gang du crime organisé,//(26.23,29.41)\\qui s'est alors lancé dans une violente campagne de représailles//(29.41,32.61)\\afin d'identifier les voleurs et récupérer leur dû.//(32.61,34.41)\\En sentant le vent tourner,//(34.41,37.03)\\les Yardbirds ont alors conclu un pacte secret ://(37.03,39.95)\\le butin resterait caché et, une fois que les choses//(39.95,43.87)\\se seraient calmées, seul le dernier survivant pourrait en hériter.//(43.87,46.61)\\Le groupe se retira et tous ses membres disparurent,//(46.61,51.1)\\jusqu'au jour où Kalvin Ritter, le Moineau, fut retrouvé mort sur son yacht.//(51.1,53.95)\\Les autres membres, eux, restèrent introuvables.//(55.25,59.6)\\La bande ne se réunit jamais au même endroit, mais aujourd'hui est un jour spécial ://(59.6,61.55)\\le mariage d'Elizabeth Lang//(61.55,64.325)\\a lieu dans le manoir de luxe de Guillaume Maison,//(64.325,67.2)\\avec Doris Lee comme invitée d'honneur.//(67.2,71.47)\\Notre client est Aleksander Kovak, fondateur des Yardbirds.//(71.47,74.51)\\Il a précisé que les trois cibles et leurs gardes du corps//(74.51,76.63)\\doivent être éliminés au cours de cet événement.//(76.63,80.93098)\\Si l'un d'eux parvient à s'échapper, le contrat est invalidé.//(80.93098,84.9)\\Il semblerait que Kovak joue sa dernière carte pour empocher les millions perdus.//(86.3,93.3)\\Bonne chance !
subtitles.it: //[DIANA]\\//(4.1,6.82)\\Benvenuto in Austria, Agente 47.//(6.82,11.15)\\I tuoi bersagli sono Dorian Lang, Guillaume Maison e Doris Lee,//(11.15,15.98)\\tre dei membri restanti della banda di ladri internazionale conosciuta col nome di Yardbird;//(15.98,18.78)\\Gli Yardbird sono famosi per le loro audaci rapine,//(18.78,22.83)\\in particolare quella che ebbe luogo al Casinò Shamal di Las Vegas.//(22.83,26.23)\\Tuttavia, i soldi si sono rivelati di proprietà di organizzazioni criminali,//(26.23,29.41)\\le quali hanno a loro volta avviato campagne di violenza e ritorsione//(29.41,32.61)\\allo scopo di identificare i ladri e ritrovare il denaro.//(32.61,34.41)\\Sentendosi braccati,//(34.41,37.03)\\gli Yardbird sottoscrissero un accordo segreto://(37.03,39.95)\\il tesoro sarebbe rimasto nascosto e l'ultimo loro membro vivente//(39.95,43.821)\\avrebbe ereditato tutto, una volta calmatesi le acque.//(43.821,46.61)\\Il gruppo si sciolse e tutti i suoi membri svanirono nel nulla fino//(46.61,51.1)\\a quando Kalvin Ritter, Lo Sparviero, venne trovato morto a bordo del suo yacht;//(51.1,53.95)\\il resto della gang, tuttavia, continuò a restare celato nell'ombra.//(55.25,59.6)\\Il gruppo non si riunisce mai in un unico posto. Ma oggi è un'occasione speciale://(59.6,61.55)\\si sta celebrando il matrimonio di Elizabeth Lang//(61.55,61.55)\\presso la lussuosa villa di Guillaume Maison...//(61.55,67.2)\\e Doris Lee è l'ospite d'onore della festa.//(67.2,71.47)\\Il nostro cliente è Aleksander Kovak, fondatore degli Yardbird.//(71.47,74.51)\\Ha deciso che nel corso di questo evento devono essere eliminati//(74.51,76.63)\\tutti e tre gli obiettivi e le rispettive guardie del corpo.//(76.63,80.9)\\Se anche uno solo degli Yardbird riuscirà a fuggire, il contratto sarà considerato nullo.//(80.9,84.9)\\A quanto pare Kovak vuole tentare il tutto per tutto per ottenere i milioni perduti.//(86.3,93.3)\\Buona fortuna!
subtitles.de: //[DIANA]\\//(4.1,6.82)\\Willkommen in Österreich, Agent 47.//(6.82,11.15)\\Ihre Ziele sind Dorian Lang, Guillaume Maison und Doris Lee,//(11.15,15.98)\\die drei verbliebenen Mitglieder einer internationalen Diebesbande, die als Die Yardbirds bekannt ist.//(15.98,18.78)\\Die Yardbirds sind berühmt für ihre wagemutigen Brüche –//(18.78,22.83)\\ insbesondere für einen, der im Shamal-Kasino in Las Vegas stattfand.//(22.83,26.23)\\Leider stellte sich heraus, dass das gestohlene Geld dem organisierten Verbrechen gehörte.//(26.23,29.41)\\Die Schwerverbrecher begannen einen gewaltsamen Rachefeldzug,//(29.41,32.61)\\um die Diebe und deren Beute aufzuspüren.//(32.61,34.41)\\Als ihnen der Boden unter den Füßen zu heiß wurde,//(34.41,37.03)\\trafen die Yardbirds eine geheime Übereinkunft://(37.03,39.95)\\Die Beute wird versteckt, und sobald sich die Wogen geglättet haben,//(39.95,43.87)\\kann der letzte Überlebende alles an sich nehmen.//(43.87,46.61)\\Die Gruppe setzte sich zur Ruhe, und alle Mitglieder verschwanden – bis man//(46.61,51.1)\\Kalvin Ritter, Der Spatz, tot auf seiner Jacht fand.//(51.1,53.95)\\Die restlichen Mitglieder blieben untergetaucht.//(55.25,59.6)\\Die Gruppe hat sich bisher nie an einem Ort versammelt. Doch heute ist eine besondere Gelegenheit://(59.6,61.55)\\Die Hochzeit von Elizabeth Lang//(61.55,64.31)\\soll im Herrenhaus von Guillaume Maison begangen werden.//(64.31,67.2)\\Doris Lee ist als Ehrengast zugegen.//(67.2,71.47)\\Unser Klient ist Aleksander Kovak, Gründer der Yardbirds.//(71.47,74.51)\\Er hat festgelegt, dass alle drei Ziele und deren Leibwächter//(74.51,76.63)\\bei diesem Event ausgeschaltet werden müssen.//(76.63,80.9)\\Sollte einer der Yardbirds entkommen, verliert der Auftrag seine Gültigkeit.//(80.9,84.9)\\Sieht ganz so aus, als ob Kovak einen letzten Versuch unternimmt, die verschwundenen Millionen an sich zu bringen.//(86.3,93.3)\\Viel Glück!
subtitles.es: //[DIANA]\\//(4.1,6.82)\\Bienvenido a Austria, Agente 47.//(6.82,11.15)\\Los objetivos son Dorian Lang, Guillaume Maison y Doris Lee,//(11.15,15.98)\\tres de los miembros supervivientes de los Yardbirds, una banda internacional de ladrones.//(15.98,18.78)\\Los Yardbirds se hicieron famosos por los golpes tan osados que perpetraban.//(18.78,22.83)\\En concreto, por uno en el casino Shamal de Las Vegas.//(22.83,26.23)\\Pero el dinero que robaron resultó pertenecer a una organización criminal//(26.23,29.41)\\que no dudó en iniciar una violenta campaña de venganza,//(29.41,32.61)\\con el objetivo de identificar a los ladrones y encontrar el dinero.//(32.61,34.41)\\Preocupados por la acuciante situación,//(34.41,37.03)\\los Yardbirds llegaron a un acuerdo secreto://(37.03,39.95)\\esconderían el tesoro y, cuando se hubiesen calmado las aguas,//(39.95,43.87)\\el último miembro superviviente de la banda se quedaría con todo.//(43.87,46.61)\\El grupo se retiró y todos sus miembros desaparecieron del mapa.//(46.61,51.1)\\Kalvin Ritter, el Gorrión, fue hallado muerto en su yate,//(51.1,53.95)\\pero ningún otro miembro salió a la luz.//(55.25,59.6)\\El grupo nunca se deja ver en un mismo lugar, pero hoy es una ocasión especial://(59.6,61.55)\\es la boda de Elizabeth Lang,//(61.55,64.31)\\que se va a celebrar en el palacete de Guillaume Maison.//(64.31,67.2)\\Doris Lee está en la lista de invitados.//(67.2,71.47)\\Nuestro cliente es Aleksander Kovak, fundador de los Yardbirds.//(71.47,74.51)\\Ha estipulado que tanto los tres objetivos como sus guardaespaldas//(74.51,76.63)\\deben ser eliminados durante este evento.//(76.63,80.9)\\Si alguno de los Yardbirds escapa, el contrato quedará anulado.//(80.9,84.9)\\Kovak va a por todas para quedarse con los millones desaparecidos.//(86.3,93.3)\\¡Buena suerte!
subtitles.ru: //[DIANA]\\//(4.1,6.82)\\Добро пожаловать в Австрию, агент 47.//(6.82,11.15)\\Твои цели — ДОРИАН ЛЭНГ, ГИЙОМ МЕЗОН и ДОРИС ЛИ,//(11.15,15.98)\\трое уцелевших членов международной банды, известной как «ПТАХИ».//(15.98,18.78)\\«Птахи» прославились дерзкими ограблениями,//(18.78,22.83)\\в частности — налетом на казино «Шамаль» в Лас-Вегасе.//(22.83,26.23)\\Оказалось, что украденные деньги принадлежали преступному синдикату.//(26.23,29.41)\\Чтобы вернуть награбленное и наказать воров,//(29.41,32.61)\\синдикат был готов на всё.//(32.61,34.41)\\Почувствовав, что запахло жареным,//(34.41,37.03)\\«Птахи» пришли к соглашению — добычу следовало припрятать,//(37.03,39.95)\\пока всё не уляжется.//(39.95,43.87)\\После этого деньги достанутся последнему выжившему члену банды.//(43.87,46.61)\\Банда отошла от дел, и о ней ничего не было слышно,//(46.61,51.1)\\пока Кэлвин Риттер по кличке Воробей не был найден мертвым на собственной яхте.//(51.1,53.95)\\Остальные «Птахи» по-прежнему держатся в тени.//(55.25,59.6)\\Члены банды никогда не собираются вместе, но сегодня особый случай —//(59.6,61.55)\\свадьба ЭЛИЗАБЕТ ЛЭНГ.//(61.55,64.31)\\В особняке ГИЙОМА МЕЗОНА соберутся гости,//(64.31,67.2)\\в том числе ДОРИС ЛИ.//(67.2,71.47)\\Наш клиент — Александр Ковак, основатель «Птах»//(71.47,74.51)\\и четвертый уцелевший член банды.//(74.51,76.63)\\Он требует, чтобы были ликвидированы все три цели//(76.63,80.9)\\и их телохранители.//(80.9,84.39)\\Если хоть одна «Птаха» скроется, контракт будет аннулирован.//(84.39,86.3)\\Похоже, Ковак решил пойти ва-банк и сорвать куш.//(86.3,93.3)\\Удачи!
subtitles.cn: //[DIANA]\\//(4.1,6.82)\\特工47，欢迎来到奥地利。//(6.82,11.15)\\你的目标是多利安·朗、吉奥姆·米森和朵丽丝·李。//(11.15,15.98)\\他们是国际盗窃团伙“院中鸟”剩下的3名成员。//(15.98,18.78)\\院中鸟胆子很肥，干过好几票大案子，因此颇有名声。//(18.78,22.83)\\其中一次盗窃案的对象是拉斯维加斯的夏马尔赌场。//(22.83,26.23)\\不过，后来发现这次偷的钱是一个有组织的犯罪团伙的财产，//(26.23,29.41)\\团伙成员为了揪出窃贼找回被盗的钱//(29.41,32.61)\\而展开了无情的报复行动。//(32.61,34.41)\\院中鸟感觉到大难临头，//(34.41,37.03)\\于是暗中达成了一致：先把偷来的钱藏好，//(37.03,39.95)\\等避过了风头，//(39.95,43.87)\\最后幸存的成员将继承组织的一切。//(43.87,46.61)\\于是这个组织销声匿迹，所有成员都人间蒸发，//(46.61,51.1)\\直到后来“麻雀”凯尔文·利特的尸体被人发现在他自己的游艇上。//(51.1,53.95)\\但其他成员仍不知所踪。//(55.25,59.6)\\这个团伙从来不约好在一个地方碰头，但今天情况特殊，//(59.6,61.55)\\因为伊丽莎白·朗//(61.55,64.31)\\要在吉奥姆·米森富丽堂皇的家里举行婚礼，//(64.31,67.2)\\而朵丽丝·李是特别来宾。//(67.2,71.47)\\我们的客户是亚历山大·科瓦克，此人是院中鸟的创始人。//(71.47,74.51)\\他明确要求我们把3个目标//(74.51,76.63)\\连同他们的保镖一起消灭。//(76.63,80.9)\\要是有院中鸟成员逃离，则契约作废。//(80.9,84.9)\\看来科瓦克准备为了追回损失的数百万美金做最后一搏了。//(86.3,93.3)\\祝你好运！
subtitles.tc: //[DIANA]\\//(4.1,6.82)\\歡迎來到奧地利，特務47。//(6.82,11.15)\\你的目標是多里安．朗、紀堯姆．梅森和朵麗絲．李，//(11.15,15.98)\\這三名國際竊盜組織「院中鳥」的僅存成員。//(15.98,18.78)\\院中鳥以大膽的竊盜案出名，//(18.78,22.83)\\特別是拉斯維加斯夏馬爾賭場的那場盜竊案。//(22.83,26.23)\\不過，這筆錢原來屬於一個犯罪組織，//(26.23,29.41)\\此組織也因此發起了暴力活動，//(29.41,32.61)\\以找出這批竊賊並尋回這筆錢。//(32.61,34.41)\\感受到了大量的壓力，//(34.41,37.03)\\院中鳥暗中進行了秘密協議，//(37.03,39.95)\\他們決定這筆財富藏著，//(39.95,43.87)\\並在事情恢復平靜後由最後一名成員接手所有資產。//(43.87,46.61)\\整個團隊便從此解散，所有成員都消失得無影無蹤，//(46.61,51.1)\\直到凱爾文．里特，綽號「飛燕」，在他的遊艇上身亡。//(51.1,53.95)\\不過剩餘的成員至今仍然保持非常隱密。//(55.25,59.6)\\這個團隊從不集結於同一處，不過今天卻是特殊場合－－//(59.6,61.5)\\伊莎麗白．朗的婚禮//(61.5,64.31)\\將在紀堯姆．梅森宮殿般的房子舉辦，//(64.31,67.2)\\而朵麗絲．李受邀作為貴賓參與。//(67.2,71.47)\\我們的客戶是亞歷山大．科瓦克，也是院中鳥的創始人。//(71.47,74.51)\\他指出三名目標//(74.51,76.63)\\與其保鏢們都必需在此活動中被消滅。//(76.63,80.9)\\要是有任何院中鳥逃脫，此契約便無效。//(80.9,84.9)\\看來科瓦克打算獨吞那隱藏的數百萬。//(86.3,93.3)\\祝你好運！
subtitles.jp: //[DIANA]\\//(4.1,6.28)\\オーストリアにようこそ、エージェント47。//(6.28,11.15)\\あなたのターゲットは、ドリアン・ラング、ギヨーム・メゾン、ドリス・リーよ。//(11.15,15.98)\\Yardbirdsとして知られる国際窃盗団の残りのメンバー3人ね。//(15.98,22.83)\\Yardbirdsは大胆な強盗手段で知られているわ。特にラスベガスのシャマール・カジノでの犯行は有名よ。//(22.83,26.23)\\でも盗んだ金は、実はある犯罪組織のものだった。//(26.23,29.41)\\組織は金を取り戻すために犯人を探し始め、//(29.41,32.61)\\報復として暴力の限りを尽くし始めた。//(32.61,34.41)\\逃げられないことを悟ったYardbirdsは、//(34.41,37.03)\\秘密の約束をした。//(37.03,39.95)\\「騒ぎが収まるまで金を隠して、//(39.95,43.87)\\その時生き残っていたメンバーが手に入れる」という約束をね。//(43.87,46.61)\\窃盗団は解体し、メンバー全員が姿を消したわ。//(46.61,51.1)\\でも、スパローことカルヴィン・リッターの死体がヨットで発見されたの。//(51.1,53.95)\\他のメンバーも行方不明のままよ。//(55.25,60.035)\\Yardbirdsが一か所に集まることは決してないわ。でも今日は特別な日。//(60.035,61.55)\\エリザベス・ラングの結婚式が//(61.55,64.31)\\ギヨーム・メゾンの屋敷で行われ、//(64.31,67.2)\\ドリス・リーが特別ゲストとして招待されているわ。//(67.2,71.47)\\クライアントはYardbirdsの創始者、アレクサンダー・コヴァックよ。//(71.47,74.51)\\彼の要求はこの三人のターゲットと//(74.51,76.63)\\それぞれのボディガード全員を結婚式で抹殺すること。//(76.63,80.9)\\Yardbirdsのメンバーが逃げた場合は、契約は無効になるわ。//(80.9,84.9)\\コヴァックは失われた大金を独り占めにしようとしているみたいね。//(86.3,88)\\幸運を祈るわ。
